entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SignalR] Stateful reconnect #46691
  • Why `Result.ValidationProblem` requires `IDictionary<string, string[]>` instead of `IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]>`? #46689
  • [Blazor] We can handle forms for server rendered razor component applications #46688
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #46686
  • Perf regression: fortunes #46685
  • Perf improvement: json #46684
  • Adding health checks with AddHealthChecks().AddCheck() prevents calls to IHeathCheckPublisher.PublishChecks #46683
  • [Blazor] Provide a primitive inside Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web for rendering output to HTML #46682
  • Reduce the size cost of unused protocol support #46681
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make generic `EndpointFilterInvocationContext` overloads public #46676
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM breaks when using UsePathBase #46674
  • Harmonize the Blazor WebAssembly SDK + the .NET WASM SDK #46673
    8.0-preview2
  • OutputCacheMiddleware argument null exception if policy sets AllowCacheLookup to false and AllowCacheStorage to true #46671
  • Mismatch in request field names between swagger and gRPC to JSON transcoding #46670
  • Can't retrieve MemoryCache statistics using dotnet-counters #46669
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4]SmartStore app some javascript function don't work after building and publishing with .net8 SDK #46692
  • Scaffolding uses Id for Foreign Key dropdown instead of Name. #46664
  • Blazor component events not trigger in MVC partial view when calling via javascript #46663
  • SignalR disconnect doesn't fire immediately #46661

Closed

  • DateOnly custom TypeConverter is ignored when using FromQuery #46384
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove (Http)(Validation)ProblemDetails converters #44132
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #46649
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Build with Error ASP0019,ASP0023 after retargeting to .NET 8.0 for OrchardCMS app #46642
  • Allow QuickGrid columns to be put in user-defined razor components. #45088
    Backlog
  • VSCode Blazor Wasm Extension - "DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED" #46445
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf regression: fortunes #46650

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync shared code from runtime #46690
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0.x
  • Introducing `IProblemDetailsService.TryWriteAsync` #46680
  • Fix nullability on DefaultEndpointFilterInvocationContext constructor #46679
    area-runtime
  • Update servicing milestones for April servicing #46675
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Transport.Quic.Tests: don't fail on distros that don't have quic. #46662
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix runtime sync script #46672
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Removing custom ProblemDetails Converters #46492
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46577
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Add support for binding parameter with [FromBody] #46641
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Streaming SSR partial doc updates #46667
  • Preserve DOM elements when inserting passive content #46666
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #46646
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.4

Updated

  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for parameter binding with [FromService] #46653
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks
  • WIP: Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Tweak exception message for `TryParse` method not found #46574
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494
    area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update .npmrc approach and locked dependencies #46601
  • HttpSys - clear overlapped handle to prevent multiple release in fault scenario #46504
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
